interaction.dialog: Emily: Dad You Made Carne Asada!
Dad: I Know It's Your Favourite
Dad: I Thought It Would Be A Nice Surprise
Mom: SO We Need To Have A Talk
You Nod As You Start To Chew
Mom: Chunkshi, Do You Remember
Mom: Why We Moved To Bismark?
You don't. You Were Only Five
Mom: Well, We Left Land To Come To Bismark
Mom: We Left Our Community
Mom: Or We Were Sent Away
Mom: You Were struck My Lightning One Night
Mom: You Wandered Out Of The House
Mom: And We Couldn't Find You
Mom: A Storm Came From Nowhere...
Dad: It Was Frightning
Dad: You Just Seemed To Vanish
Dad: We Searched But Had To Move Low
Mom: At One Point Lightning Struck
Mom: The Ground Close By
Mom: When We Could See Again
Mom: You Were Lying Down On The Grass
Dad: We Thought...
Mom: You Were Fast Asleep
Dad: We Brought You To A Medicine Man
Dad: They Told Us You Were Wakinyan
Mom: A Thunder Being
Mom: That The Storm That Night
Mom: Was A Wakinyan Coming To Grant You Power
Mom: I Think That You Had A Vision
Mom: Of Wakinyan
Mom: When You Were Hurt At Karate
Mom: I Spoke With Some Other Physicists
Mom: They Share My Hypothisys
This Sounds Ridiculous
Infact
Emily: This Sounds Ridiculous Mom
Emily: How Could I Survive
Emily: Getting Hit By Lightning
Emily: No Way
You Run To Bed
